analytic.title: Congregation for the Eastern Churches. Instruction for Applying the Liturgical Prescriptions of the Code of Canons of the Eastern Churches: Introduction

monogr.title: Bride at the Feet of the Bridegroom: Studies in East Syrian Liturgical Law. A Tribute to Archbishop Mar Joseph Powathil

body.bibl: Koodapuzha, Xavier. “Congregation for the Eastern Churches. Instruction for Applying the Liturgical Prescriptions of the Code of Canons of the Eastern Churches: Introduction.” In Bride at the Feet of the Bridegroom: Studies in East Syrian Liturgical Law. A Tribute to Archbishop Mar Joseph Powathil, edited by Antony George Kollamparampil and Joseph Perumthottam, 15–22. Catholic Theological Studies of India 1. Changanassery: HIRS Publications, 1997.

Xavier Koodapuzha, Congregation for the Eastern Churches. Instruction for Applying the Liturgical Prescriptions of the Code of Canons of the Eastern Churches: Introduction, in Bride at the Feet of the Bridegroom: Studies in East Syrian Liturgical Law. A Tribute to Archbishop Mar Joseph Powathil, ed. Antony George Kollamparampil and Joseph Perumthottam, Catholic Theological Studies of India 1 (Changanassery: HIRS Publications, 1997), 15–22.
